bug.author: jlewi
bug.description:
We should delete the ksonnet registry on master <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/tree/master/kubeflow>https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/tree/master/kubeflow</denchmark-link>
ksonnet is no longer supported on master and should no longer be used on master.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.62. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

/hold Let's hold this story for a while.
Leave it for package migration Looks like a lots of examples are still using the packages there.
Probably after we confirm all docs/examples are up to date

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Jeffwan>@Jeffwan</denchmark-link> Can you point out the examples that are referring to the ksonnet registry? mnist has been updated to use kustomize <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/mnist>https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/mnist</denchmark-link>
It looks like github_issue_summarization is still using ksonnet <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/github_issue_summarization>https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/github_issue_summarization</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/issues/617>kubeflow/examples#617</denchmark-link> is tracking cleaning up the github issue summarization example. I'm downgrading to P2 and removing from 0.7 because its not actually release blocking.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> I checked few of them, seems they still have ksonnet dependency <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/blob/master/pytorch_mnist/02_distributed_training.md>https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/blob/master/pytorch_mnist/02_distributed_training.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/blob/master/object_detection/submit_job.md>https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/blob/master/object_detection/submit_job.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/code_search/ks-web-app>https://github.com/kubeflow/examples/tree/master/code_search/ks-web-app</denchmark-link>
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
